body: Not much time to explain, but I will be moving and going on trips this next month, so don't expect me to be online for a while. Cya then!
body_tagged: Not much time to explain, but I will be moving and going on trips this next month, so don't expect me to be online for a while. Cya then!
title: Absence

replies.body:
Temporarily Leaving Threads are not allowed.
Rule:
D. Forum Rules ยง7 Discussions surrounding personal updates, accomplishments or events is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. Punishments for this will only be distributed in the event that a user continuously uses the forums for this purpose alone.

Anyways have fun!
